briefdescription.para: Area Detector driver for the LBNL FastCCD Modifed by S.
Exit handler, delete the FastCCD object.
IOC shell configuration command for debug output.

parameterdescription.para: (0 = no error output, 1 = error output to stderr)
(0 = no debug output, 1 = debug output to stderr)

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize, int packetBuffer, int imageBuffer, const char *baseIP, const char *fabricIP, const char *fabricMAC)
memberdef.name: FastCCDConfig

briefdescription.para: IOC shell configuration command for FastCCD driver.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread
